author: jtraglia
content:
Hey everyone, I'd like to share a utility I made: https://jtraglia.github.io/eth-spec-viewer/

It's pretty basic right now and the underlying code is bad (I'm not a web developer ğŸ˜…), but it might be useful in its current state. I'm welcome to feedback and feature requests. The intention is to make it easier to see the consensus specifications as a whole & compare with previous forks. Currently, only presets/configs/functions are shown.
